amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part C of House Report 115-212 to set a timeline for completion of the New Melones Reservoir study, prevents exploitation of water rights, extends the program to protect Anadromous Fish in Stanislaus River for 2 years.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Denham amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Denham.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Denham amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
